hero.title: Welcome to Tanzeem-e-Khawjgan
hero.subtitle: Serving our community with dedication and compassion
hero.description: A trusted organization committed to providing quality services in education, healthcare, sports, and community development.

introduction.heading: Who We Are
introduction.content: Tanzeem-e-Khawjgan is a community-focused organization dedicated to improving lives through comprehensive services and programs. We believe in creating positive change through education, healthcare, sports, and community engagement.
highlights: Serving the community for years with excellence
Committed to quality education and skill development

imageSection.title: Our Impact in the Community
imageSection.description: Through our various programs and services, we continue to make a meaningful difference in people's lives.
